  • Simpatico - Simulation Package for Polymer and Molecular Liquids

Compilation Options

Many features and behaviors of Simpatico can be modified when the program is compiled:

Contents:

  • Preprocessor Macros: Some optional features can be enabled or disabled at compile time by C++ preprocessor macros that control conditional compilation.
  • Unit Cell Type: The type of unit cell (cubic, orthorhombic, etc) is also specified by a typedef, which may be modified at compile time to change the type of unit cell.
